 I have recently pulled out of the closet a sword I've had for over 
ten years. It appears to be a Japanese sword with some years on it.  
The scabbard is wooden and covered with leather, yet well worn.  The 
sword itself has no identifying marks on it.  The handle has been 
unwrapped and is bare wood.  I have looked on the internet, but have 
decided that all of this is more than my mind alone can handle,  I 
need some help.
